Description: “Making biryani from scratch can take time and effort however with National’s famous Sindhi biryani mix, we guarantee you will be indulging in Daigi style traditional biryani without the extra hassle. This recipe mix will ensure your chicken/meat and potatoes are cooked in our perfect blend of spices and herbs that give maximum flavour and heat with each grain of rice infused in fragrant aroma that you just can’t resist!

Prepare delicious Pulao in no time with the help of National Pulao Mix. Mixed with varieties of herbs and spices, this mix adds a fragrant aroma and wholesome flavour to every grain of rice and meat. Create your own variation of Pulao with our mix as this can be added to chicken, meat, chickpeas and/or vegetables. Best served with Raita.

Making biryani from scratch can take time and effort however with National\’s famous Biryani mix, we guarantee you will be indulging in Daigi style traditional biryani without the extra hassle. This recipe mix will ensure your chicken/meat and potatoes are cooked in our perfect blend of spices and herbs that give maximum flavour and heat with each grain of rice infused in fragrant aroma that you just can\’t resist

Add excitement to the dining table by serving delicious authentic Karahi Gosht with the help of National karahi gosht Recipe Mix. A flavorful blend of spices and herbs that delivers aroma and flavorsome taste. Now serve restaurant quality food from the comfort of your home.

Prepare traditional chatkharidar Achar Gosht in no time with the help of National Achar Gosht Masala Mix. Mixed with varieties of herbs and spices, this mix adds a fragrant aroma and a spicy tangy flavour of pickles to your meat.

Prepare traditional Daigi style Quorma with National Quorma Recipe Mix. A combination of rich and fragrant spices and herbs that helps you prepare a delicious quorma in no time! Includes a Free ” National Bombay Biryani Recipe Mix” Sachet in the box, to add more to your dinner table.

Prepare delicious Paya salan with the help of National Paya Recipe Mix. A perfect blend of aromatic and rich herbs and spices creating a flavorsome traditional meal. An ideal dish to serve in dawat and events in the winter season.

Traditional mix of cumin, turmeric, ginger spices and dry herbs, blended to form the perfect home-made style curry mix. A delicious flavorsome desi taste and a fragrant aroma to make your meal burst with flavour. A perfect option for easy cooking & instant serving for any event.

National Murghi Masala provides the ultimate blend of spices and herbs to give your Chicken Gravy a distinctive flavor and aroma. Conveniently prepare dishes without compromising on taste with help of our recipe mix.
Prepare delicious kofta curry with the help of National Kofta Recipe Mix. A perfect blend of aromatic and rich herbs and spices that seasons and flavors the kofta meat perfectly.
Indulge in traditional Delhi Nihari from the comfort of your home using National Delhi Nihari Recipe Mix; which is prepared by Pakistani cuisine experts; using the ultimate blend of spices and herbs.

Indulge in a traditional BBQ by making delicious mouth watering tikka with National Tikka Boti Masala. A tantalizing blend of spices and fragrant herbs that helps make the meat tender and juicy. Now you can enjoy your favourite Tikka recipe at home without the extra hassle.

Indulge in a traditional BBQ by using National’s Bihari Kabab Mix to create signature Bihari style kebabs with the perfect blend of hot spices for a delicious marinade. Now you can enjoy spicy, delicious Bihari Style BBQ meat without the extra hassle.

Indulge in a traditional desi BBQ by using National’s Chicken Tandoori Mix to create signature tandoori with the perfect blend of hot spices for succulant and juicy chicken. Now you can enjoy authentic spicy and delicious chicken tandoori at home without the extra hassle.

Indulge in a traditional desi BBQ by using National’s Chicken Tikka Mix to create signature chicken tikka with the perfect blend of hot spices for succulant and juicy chicken. Now you can enjoy authentic spicy and delicious chicken tandoori at home without the extra hassle. This mix can be used as a seasoning or flavouring for other dishes like sandwiches, pasta and many more.

Create your favourite spicy Fish recipe with the help of National Fish Recipe Mix. A blend of flavorful spices and fragrant herbs to make the perfect marination for any kind of fish. Helps in tenderizing and absorbing flavour. Perfect for fried, grilled and roasted fish.

National’s Shami Kabab Recipe Mix helps you prepare delicious shami Kababs at home with the perfect blend mix of spices and herbs to give you that authentic flavour. Now you can enjoy home made spicy, mouth watering Shami Kababs without the extra hassle.

Prepare delicious crispy and spicy coating for your broast with National Broast Batter Mix Masala. Incredibly easy to prepare and cook. Flavorsome spices and herbs blended in a batter mix that coats the meat to perfection and brings out the classic broast look and taste at home in a matter of minutes. Serve it with fries and National’s Garlic Mayo to enhance the eating experience.

Indulge in a traditional BBQ by using National’s Chapli Kabab Mix to create signature kebabs with the perfect blend of hot spices for delicious tender meat. Now you can enjoy authentic spicy and delicious chapli kebabs at home without the extra hassle.

Looking for a convenient Haleem Mix with an authentic Haleem flavor? Look no further than National\’s Quick Cook Haleem. This recipe mix is a blend of spices and lentils that will help you cook traditional Haleem in no time.
Prepare delicious authentic Haleem with National. A blend of spices, lentils mix and your choice of meat, stirred and cooked to perfection to make this wholesome meal for any event.

Get the familiar taste of Traditional Daighi Danedar Haleem with National. A blend of spices, lentils mix and your choice of meat, stirred to perfection to make the ideal traditional meal for any event.

Are you tired of cooking repetitive Sabzi recipes with the same ordinary taste? Add a burst of flavor and irresistible aroma by using National Chatkharaydaar Sabzi Recipe Mix and amaze your family. Used and recommended by Pakistani cuisine experts; the Chatkharaydaar Sabzi Recipe mix adds a tangy twist to your vegetarian dishes. Just one sachet prepares a delicious meal for your entire family of 5-6 people.Get your Rozana box now, that contains 2 sachets of Rozana Recipes and a whole load of tangy, spicy goodness.

Just one sachet prepares a delicious meal for your entire family of 5-6 people.Get your Rozana box now, that contains 2 sachets of Rozana Recipes and a whole load of flavour and spicy goodness.

National’s Chilli Powder adds the perfect amount of pungency and hotness to your dishes and gives them a burst of flavor. Made from pure and fresh spices, gives this a natural red color. The spiciness will enhance the taste of your dishes, especially Pakistani cuisines.

Give your dishes a burst of flavor and an enticing aroma. National Ginger Powder is made from premium quality natural ginger; without any artificial colors and flavors. Our fine textured Ginger Powder is a healthy choice to add in your food due to its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.

National ensures that you get the purest spices by only selecting the finest raw materials and carefully packaging them under strict hygienic conditions, ensuring quality at every step of the process following international and GMP standards.
National Coriander Powder comes packaged in a bag and sealed in a box.

This multi-purpose herb provides a fragrant aroma and rich flavor by transforming your meals by adding a sweetness and depth of flavour to any dish. Typically, Kasuri Methi pairs well with potatoes and is used to make “Aloo Methi”. It is also used in doughs for Parathas and Naan and is sprinkled over curries with meat.

National Foods Limited is the pioneer of branded spices in clean packaged form in Pakistan. We ensure that you get the purest spices by selecting only the finest raw materials and maintaining strict quality control at our state-of-the art manufacturing facilities. National Garlic Powder is a great addition to make your dishes exceedingly appetizing and aromatic. Our fine textured Garlic Powder is the perfect choice to add to your cooking because it enhances the overall flavour of your dish.

National iodized Salt is a specially refined; brilliant white food grade salt. It includes essential iodine which helps in the proper mental development of children and prevents iodine deficiency in adults.

Made with real garlic chunks, National Chilli Garlic Sauce is bound to entice your tastebuds with its perfectly delicious taste!

National Mixed Pickle is prepared with high quality ingredients including flavorsome oils, freshly picked succulent mixed vegetables and the perfect balance of spices to give it a delicious spicy and tangy flavor. It contains the perfect mix of vegetables including chatkharaydaar keri, green chillies, carrots and more, tossed in a delicious blend of aromatic spices. This is a favourite of all Pickle lovers, and is enjoyed thouroughly with traditional desi dishes.

This is a favourite of all Pickle lovers, and is enjoyed thouroughly with traditional desi dishes.

National Crushed Pickles offers a perfectly balanced taste of crushed mixed vegetables in every bite, making it the perfect meal companion. Whether used as a condiment, stuffing, topping, ingredient for cooking or even as a spread over paratha, National Crushed Pickle will add just the right excitement to your meal! It is packed in a convenient jar with foil seal which helps keep the freshness intact.
